description: This script collects system metrics and diagnostic information such as hardware details, memory info, CPU info, and system configuration, and writes it into specified log files. It includes functions for retrieving MAC addresses, CPU models, and system info, dynamically sets file paths based on device type, and performs memory and CPU data collection.

methods.name: setLogFile
methods.description: Sets the log file path based on suffix input and deletes existing log file.

methods.name: getEthMac
methods.description: Retrieves the MAC address of the primary Ethernet interface based on device type.

methods.name: getCpuModel
methods.description: Obtains the CPU model name from /proc/cpuinfo.

methods.name: populateSystemInfo
methods.description: Collects and logs system information such as image name, MAC address, date, hostname, kernel release, CPU model, uptime, compiler version, and OpenSSL version.

methods.name: populateSysMemInfo
methods.description: Gathers and logs memory-related information from /proc/meminfo.

methods.name: populateSysCPUInfo
methods.description: Gathers and logs CPU statistics from /proc/stat.

methods.name: calc_bogo_ops
methods.description: Calculates and logs benchmark performance metrics based on input parameters.
